item.title: Seagull Repair - TLR Camera Shenanigans
item.description: Amateur bird veterinarian As of late, I seem to spend a lot of time fixing film cameras. Could have something to do with my role as TA for a photography class at MIT (EC.305) or my excess spending on admittedly crappy vintage film equipment. I swear it was such a good deal on eBay! Anyways, the camera I’m attempting to coax back to life today is a Seagull TLR medium format camera.
